meanings.definition: Untidy or slovenly in appearance or habits.
meanings.sent1: She always looks slobby with her wrinkled clothes.
meanings.sent2: The messy room was a result of his slobby habits.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked slobby after rolling around in the dirt.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a slobby mess of overgrown weeds and tangled vines.
meanings.sent5: The slobby kitchen was filled with unwashed dishes and scattered crumbs.

meanings.definition: A person who is untidy or slovenly in appearance or habits.
meanings.sent1: Don't be a slobby and clean up after yourself.
meanings.sent2: The office janitor scolded the slobby for leaving trash everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The slobby at the party spilled their drink on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The neighborhood slobby was known for always wearing mismatched socks.
meanings.sent5: The new roommate turned out to be a slobby who never did their laundry.
